name: 3113 Unknown Earth
description:
This is a prototype game.

The game takes place on earth but in a more advanced year, you are a pilot of exploratory androids and need to collect the relics that were abandoned on earth, as it is no longer able to sustain human life.

The structure of the earth has changed, it is more full of life, with abundant vegetation and animals and no pollution, the animals are much larger and still pose a danger even to androids.

The game will initially be single player and open world, and you will be able to choose the android you want to activate.

Also in the changes of some levels the game goes from third person to first person.
